TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is being studied in the treatment of cancer. It comes from a fungus and is similar to vinca alkaloid drugs. It belongs to the family of drugs called antimitotic agents.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio para el tratamiento del cáncer. Viene de un hongo y es similar a los medicamentos alcaloides obtenidos de la vincristina y la vimblastina. Es un tipo de antimitótico.
